div.ab: + I welcome and salute the footstool of the feet of your God-honoured lord and honoured father. I tell . . . our village Pesou(te) (?), we (?) . . . I ask your God-honoured lord and father to order him to send two maphortia to us according to the annual custom. My (?) lord, your brother was not kind to us this year. I trust God with you that . . . and you are merciful with us. I beg you, be merciful with us so that the blessing of the saints might come down upon you and all of your blessed congregation. I salute your God-honoured lord and honoured father through this letter + (back side) ++ (To my) God-honoured lord and honoured father. . .
